00032 typedef void (*RecordFunc)(void *, simtime_t, double, double);
00033 
00034 class TOutVectorInspector;
00035 class TOutVectorWindow;

00045 class SIM_API cOutVector : public cObject
00046 {
00047   protected:
00048     bool enabled;        // if false, record() method will do nothing
00049     int tupl;            // values: 1 or 2
00050     void *handle;        // identifies output vector for the output vector manager
00051     long num_received;   // total number of values passed to the output vector object
00052     long num_stored;     // number of values actually stored
00053     simtime_t last_t;    // last timestamp written, needed to ensure increasing timestamp order
00054 
00055     // the following members will be used directly by inspectors
00056     RecordFunc record_in_inspector; // to notify inspector about file writes
00057     void *data_for_inspector;
00058 
00059   public:
00060     // internal: called from behind cEnvir
00061     void setCallback(RecordFunc f, void *d) {record_in_inspector=f; data_for_inspector=d;}
00062 
00063   public:
00070     explicit cOutVector(const char *name=NULL, int tuple=1);
00071 
00075     cOutVector(const cOutVector& r) : cObject() {setName(r.name());operator=(r);}
00076 
00080     virtual ~cOutVector();
00081 
00085     cOutVector& operator=(const cOutVector&)  {copyNotSupported();return *this;}
00087 
00090 
00095     virtual void setName(const char *name);
00096 
00101     virtual cPolymorphic *dup() const    {return new cOutVector(*this);}
00102 
00107     virtual std::string info() const;
00108 
00113     virtual void netPack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00114 
00119     virtual void netUnpack(cCommBuffer *buffer);
00121 
00124 
00132     virtual bool record(double value);
00133 
00141     virtual bool record(double value1, double value2);
00142 
00154     virtual bool recordWithTimestamp(simtime_t t, double value);
00155 
00167     virtual bool recordWithTimestamp(simtime_t t, double value1, double value2);
00168 
00172     virtual void enable()  {enabled=true;}
00173 
00178     virtual void disable()  {enabled=false;}
00179 
00184     virtual void setEnabled(bool b)  {enabled=b;}
00185 
00189     virtual bool isEnabled() const  {return enabled;}
00190 
00196     long valuesReceived() const  {return num_received;}
00197 
00203     long valuesStored() const  {return num_stored;}
00204 
00208     int tuple() {return tupl;}
00210 };
